ProfileInformation.Author: fulatoro[Z-7]
ProfileInformation.Description:
Switch 1 turns on Engine 1

switch 2 turns on Engine 2

Switch 3 Sets ENG Mode Selector to Start

switch 7 turns on parking brakes

flap lever short press zooms the efis, long press changes modes

hdg, vs, ias, and alt buttons short press acts as push on the respective knob, long press is pull

auto pilot acts as autopilot, but long holding it does cabin calls

flaps, throttles, spoilers, gear all mapped in msfs

Startup from cold and dark. Make sure all switches are off (if not, close spad.next, turn them off and reopen)
turn switch 1 on, turn switch 2 on, turn switch 3 on; wait for apu, turn switch 4 to start the engines, then turn switch 4 and 2 off once engines are started.
